author: Odeinoichus
title: Winged Warriors of Odin! CHARGE!
review:
Set #71011 Flying Warrior: Yes I know, I know, Flash Gordon, but honestly I don't believe this is what LEGO was going for when they made this CMF Series 15 gem.

The Flying Warrior is made in mostly gold ABS plastics with fine printed detailing, he features a single-sided torso print for his armour, some leg printing on regular legs, no dual-molding for his boots this time. The print shows off a nice looking armoured skirt piece similar to Roman Soldiers, only in Gold.

Then we come to the accessories. I don't own him yet, so I'm not sure if these were used first with Hawkman over in DC Super Heroes, but they do certainly look nice. The winged helm would make an excellent use for a Comics Accurate Thor, and the golden wings attach to a nice looking shoulder armour piece that is quite bulky, it hinders arm motions unfortunately so getting him to hold the spear accessory straight in an at-attention pose isn't possible. Perhaps a sword and shield would have served him better.

Really recommend getting this one, Series 15 has a lot of great figures and you'll definitely want them all if you haven't gotten them all yet.
